_description: ‘Of the Passioun of Christ’ by William Dunbar — six 8-line stanzas with refrain: ‘Thys blissit saluator chryst Iesu’

CamMagPep2553.First Lines:
Methocht compassioun vode of feirisThan straik at me with mony ane
                    stound…
CamMagPep2553.Last Lines:
…Quhat me befell on gud frydayBefoir the crose of sweit
                    Iesu
CamMagPep2553.Note: No indication of separation between this and preceding 467.
